phase_diagrams.name: Phase Diagrams
phase_diagrams.description: Graphical representations of the phases of a material system as a function of temperature, pressure, and composition.

kinetics_of_phase_transformations.name: Kinetics of Phase Transformations
kinetics_of_phase_transformations.description: Study of the rates and mechanisms of phase changes in materials.

recrystallization.name: Recrystallization
recrystallization.description: Process of forming new crystal grains in a material to replace deformed ones during annealing.

Ostwald_ripening.name: Ostwald Ripening
Ostwald_ripening.description: Phenomenon where larger particles grow at the expense of smaller ones due to interfacial energy differences.

hot_brittleness.name: Hot Brittleness
hot_brittleness.description: Loss of ductility in materials at elevated temperatures during deformation.

mathematical_modeling_of_austenite_decom.name: Mathematical Modeling of Austenite Decomposition
mathematical_modeling_of_austenite_decom.description: Computer-based model simulating phase transformations in alloyed steels under varying cooling rates.

deformation_heat_processing.name: Deformation Heat Processing
deformation_heat_processing.description: Sequential hot deformation and annealing to refine microstructure and enhance mechanical properties.

phase_transformations.name: Phase Transformations
phase_transformations.description: Changes in material phases (e.g., austenite to ferrite) driven by thermodynamic and kinetic factors.

carbonitride_precipitation.name: Carbonitride Precipitation
carbonitride_precipitation.description: Formation of dispersed carbonitride particles in steel, affecting recrystallization and mechanical properties.

hot_deformation.name: Hot Deformation
hot_deformation.description: Plastic shaping of materials at elevated temperatures to refine microstructure.

nucleation_and_growth.name: Nucleation and Growth
nucleation_and_growth.description: Formation and expansion of new phase nuclei in a material.

computer_program_C++.name: C++ Computer Program
computer_program_C++.description: Software tool for simulating phase transformations in alloyed steels.

materials_science.name: Materials Science
materials_science.description: Interdisciplinary field studying the properties and applications of materials.

metallurgy.name: Metallurgy
metallurgy.description: Science of extracting, processing, and modifying metals and alloys.

I_M_Frantsevich_Institute.name: I. M. Frantsevich Institute for Problems in Materials Science
I_M_Frantsevich_Institute.description: Ukrainian research institute specializing in materials science and engineering.

V_V_Kaverynsky.name: V. V. Kaverynsky
V_V_Kaverynsky.description: Researcher in materials science, focusing on phase transformations and alloy processing.

MFiNT_39_1051.name: Mathematical Modelling of Kinetics of Decomposition of the Supercooled Austenite in Alloyed Steels
MFiNT_39_1051.description: Develops a model to predict phase transformations in steels, validated against experimental data.

CALPHAD_method.name: CALPHAD Method
CALPHAD_method.description: Computational approach for calculating phase diagrams and thermodynamic properties.

ductility.name: Ductility
ductility.description: Ability of a material to deform under tensile stress without fracture.

ultimate_tensile_strength.name: Ultimate Tensile Strength
ultimate_tensile_strength.description: Maximum stress a material can withstand while being stretched or pulled.

verified_model.name: Verified Model
verified_model.description: Computer model validated against experimental data for phase transformation predictions.

improved_ductility_and_strength.name: Improved Ductility and Strength
improved_ductility_and_strength.description: Enhanced mechanical properties in Al-Si alloys via deformation heat processing.
